RWD¶

extremals.RWD(value, mean, unstd)[source]¶

Relative Weighted Distance

Parameters:
  • value – Either a number or a pandas series
  • mean,unstds – numbers
Returns:

the value (value-mean)/unstd except special cases

In Normalize you can read more about this function.
